short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to rename tabs easily

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bring order to your browsing chaos with Rename Tab Monkey! This handy extension lets you rename your tabs quickly and easily, helping you stay organized and efficient. Rename your tabs either directly via the extension or by right-clicking and selecting "Rename Monkey" from the context menu.

Features:

ğŸ’ Simple Tab Renaming: Assign meaningful names to your tabs for easy identification.
ğŸ’ Persistent Names: Tab names are saved permanently and can be edited anytime.
ğŸ’ Flexible Options: Choose between global renaming (all tabs on a domain) or specific renaming (only the current tab).
ğŸ’ User-Friendly Interface: Intuitive popup design with clear instructions and immediate changes.
ğŸ’ Monkey Facts: Enjoy random fun monkey facts at the settings page

Install Rename Tab Monkey today and make your tab management a breeze!
